languages.text: "Говорили мне, что благородн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}лично принял{rt_mf||а} ключ от Тассеры{/d} из рук скомороха. Не погнушал{rt_mf|ся|ась}, не ударил{rt_mf||а}! Снизош{rt_mf|ел|ла}..." {n}Голос слуги опускается до благоговейного шепота.{/n} "Так ведь было, Мейв?"
languages.translation_comment:
приняли ключ в диалоге Entry
Плешивый простолюдин

traits.locale_text: "Говорили мне, что благородн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} {d|Encyclopedia:}лично принял{rt_mf||а} ключ от Тассеры{/d} из рук скомороха. Не погнушал{rt_mf|ся|ась}, не ударил{rt_mf||а}! Снизош{rt_mf|ел|ла}..." {n}Голос слуги опускается до благоговейного шепота.{/n} "Так ведь было, Мейв?"
traits.speaker: FW_GossipingCommoner1

languages.translation_comment:
приняли ключ в диалоге Entry
Плешивый простолюдин

languages.text: "I was told the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}accepted{/d} the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands {rt_mf|himself|herself}. {rt_mf|He|She} didn't shun the fool, {rt_mf|he|she} didn't beat him! So gracious..." {n}the servant whispers with reverence.{/n} "That's how it happened. Right, Maive?"
languages.original_text: "Говорили мне, что благородн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}лично принял{rt_mf||а} ключ от Тассеры{/d} из рук скомороха. Не погнушал{rt_mf|ся|ась}, не ударил{rt_mf||а}! Снизош{rt_mf|ел|ла}..." {n}Голос слуги опускается до благоговейного шепота.{/n} "Так ведь было, Мейв?"

traits.locale_text: "I've been told the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} accepted the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands {rt_mf|himself|herself}. {rt_mf|He|She} didn't shun the fool, {rt_mf|he|she} didn't hit him! {rt_mf|He|She} had the broadness of mind..." {n}The servant's voice drops to a reverent whisper.{/n} "That was how it happened, wasn't it, Maive?"

"I've been told the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} accepted the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands {rt_mf|himself|herself}. {rt_mf|He|She} didn't shun the fool, {rt_mf|he|she} didn't hit him! {rt_mf|He|She} had the broadness of mind..." {n}The servant's voice drops to a reverent whisper.{/n} "That was how it happened, wasn't it, Maive?"

"I was told the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}accepted{/d} the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands {rt_mf|himself|herself}. {rt_mf|He|She} didn't shun the fool, {rt_mf|he|she} didn't beat him! So gracious..." {n}the servant whispers with reverence.{/n} "That's how it happened. Right, Maive?"

languages.text: “有人告诉我说，那位来自上界的大人亲手从宫廷小丑手里{d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}接过了{/d}塔瑟拉的钥匙。{rt_mf|他|她}没有躲开那个小丑，甚至都没有揍他！{rt_mf|他|她}真是个亲切的人……”{n}眼前的仆人恭敬地低声说道。{/n}“真的是这样吗，梅芙？”
languages.original_text: "I was told the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}accepted{/d} the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands {rt_mf|himself|herself}. {rt_mf|He|She} didn't shun the fool, {rt_mf|he|she} didn't beat him! So gracious..." {n}the servant whispers with reverence.{/n} "That's how it happened. Right, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: “有人告诉我说，那位来自上界的大人亲手从宫廷小丑手里接过了塔瑟拉的钥匙。{rt_mf|他|她}没有躲开那个小丑，甚至都没有揍他！{rt_mf|他|她}真是个亲切的人……”{n}眼前的仆人恭敬地低声说道。{/n}“真的是这样吗，梅芙？”
“有人告诉我说，那位来自上界的大人亲手从宫廷小丑手里接过了塔瑟拉的钥匙。{rt_mf|他|她}没有躲开那个小丑，甚至都没有揍他！{rt_mf|他|她}真是个亲切的人……”{n}眼前的仆人恭敬地低声说道。{/n}“真的是这样吗，梅芙？”

languages.text: «Me han dicho que {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}aceptó{/d} la llave de Thassera de manos del bufón en persona. No rechazó al bufón, ¡ni tampoco le dio una paliza! Qué amable...». {n}El sirviente susurra con respeto.{/n} «Así fue, ¿verdad, Maive?».
languages.original_text: "I was told the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}accepted{/d} the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands {rt_mf|himself|herself}. {rt_mf|He|She} didn't shun the fool, {rt_mf|he|she} didn't beat him! So gracious..." {n}the servant whispers with reverence.{/n} "That's how it happened. Right, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: «Me han dicho que {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} aceptó la llave de Thassera de manos del bufón en persona. No rechazó al bufón, ¡ni tampoco le dio una paliza! Qué amable...». {n}El sirviente susurra con respeto.{/n} «Así fue, ¿verdad, Maive?».

«Me han dicho que {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} aceptó la llave de Thassera de manos del bufón en persona. No rechazó al bufón, ¡ni tampoco le dio una paliza! Qué amable...». {n}El sirviente susurra con respeto.{/n} «Así fue, ¿verdad, Maive?».

languages.text: "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} Thassera'nın anahtarını saray soytarısının ellerinden {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}kabul ettiğini{/d} duydum. Soytarıdan kaçmamış, onu dövmemiş! Ne kadar da lütufkâr..." {n}Hizmetkâr hürmetle fısıldıyor.{/n} "Olan buydu. Değil mi Maive?"
languages.original_text: "I was told the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}accepted{/d} the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands {rt_mf|himself|herself}. {rt_mf|He|She} didn't shun the fool, {rt_mf|he|she} didn't beat him! So gracious..." {n}the servant whispers with reverence.{/n} "That's how it happened. Right, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} Thassera'nın anahtarını saray soytarısının ellerinden kabul ettiğini duydum. Soytarıdan kaçmamış, onu dövmemiş! Ne kadar da lütufkâr..." {n}Hizmetkâr hürmetle fısıldıyor.{/n} "Olan buydu. Değil mi Maive?"

"Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} Thassera'nın anahtarını saray soytarısının ellerinden kabul ettiğini duydum. Soytarıdan kaçmamış, onu dövmemiş! Ne kadar da lütufkâr..." {n}Hizmetkâr hürmetle fısıldıyor.{/n} "Olan buydu. Değil mi Maive?"

languages.text: 「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}がご自身で宮廷道化師の手からタッセーラの鍵を{d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}受け取ったということを聞いた{/d}。{rt_mf|君|姫}は、その道化を避けることなく、叩くこともなく、本当に親切だったと…」{n}使用人は尊敬の念を持って囁く。{/n}「本当にそうだったのかい、メイヴ？」
languages.original_text: "I was told the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}accepted{/d} the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands {rt_mf|himself|herself}. {rt_mf|He|She} didn't shun the fool, {rt_mf|he|she} didn't beat him! So gracious..." {n}the servant whispers with reverence.{/n} "That's how it happened. Right, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: 「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}がご自身で宮廷道化師の手からタッセーラの鍵を受け取ったということを聞いた。{rt_mf|君|姫}は、その道化を避けることなく、叩くこともなく、本当に親切だったと…」{n}使用人は尊敬の念を持って囁く。{/n}「本当にそうだったのかい、メイヴ？」
「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}がご自身で宮廷道化師の手からタッセーラの鍵を受け取ったということを聞いた。{rt_mf|君|姫}は、その道化を避けることなく、叩くこともなく、本当に親切だったと…」{n}使用人は尊敬の念を持って囁く。{/n}「本当にそうだったのかい、メイヴ？」

languages.text: « J'ai entendu dire que {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste a {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}reçu{/d} la clé de Thassera des mains du bouffon de la cour, sans chercher à le chasser, et sans même le faire battre ! Quelle générosité, » {n}murmure le serviteur avec révérence.{/n} « C'est bien ce qui s'est passé, n'est-ce pas, Maive ? »
languages.original_text: "I was told the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}accepted{/d} the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands {rt_mf|himself|herself}. {rt_mf|He|She} didn't shun the fool, {rt_mf|he|she} didn't beat him! So gracious..." {n}the servant whispers with reverence.{/n} "That's how it happened. Right, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu dire que {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste a reçu la clé de Thassera des mains du bouffon de la cour, sans chercher à le chasser, et sans même le faire battre ! Quelle générosité, » {n}murmure le serviteur avec révérence.{/n} « C'est bien ce qui s'est passé, n'est-ce pas, Maive ? »

« J'ai entendu dire que {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste a reçu la clé de Thassera des mains du bouffon de la cour, sans chercher à le chasser, et sans même le faire battre ! Quelle générosité, » {n}murmure le serviteur avec révérence.{/n} « C'est bien ce qui s'est passé, n'est-ce pas, Maive ? »

languages.text: "Ich habe gehört, {rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} hat den Schlüssel zu Thassera höchstselbst aus den Händen des Hofnarren {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}empfangen{/d}. {rt_mf|Er|Sie} hat den Narren nicht verprügelt! So gütig ..." {n}Die letzten Worte flüstert der Diener ehrfürchtig.{/n} "So ist es gewesen. Nicht wahr, Maive?"
languages.original_text: "I was told the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyRTDecision}accepted{/d} the key to Thassera from the court fool's hands {rt_mf|himself|herself}. {rt_mf|He|She} didn't shun the fool, {rt_mf|he|she} didn't beat him! So gracious..." {n}the servant whispers with reverence.{/n} "That's how it happened. Right, Maive?"

So gütig ..." {n}Die letzten Worte flüstert der Diener ehrfürchtig.{/n} "So ist es gewesen. Nicht wahr, Maive?"

"Ich habe gehört, {rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} hat den Schlüssel zu Thassera höchstselbst aus den Händen des Hofnarren empfangen. {rt_mf|Er|Sie} hat den Narren nicht verprügelt! So gütig ..." {n}Die letzten Worte flüstert der Diener ehrfürchtig.{/n} "So ist es gewesen. Nicht wahr, Maive?"
